ad_text: United Tire Recyclers Sponsored We are looking for a Full and Part time experienced Class A or Class B CDL Drivers to run local routes out of our yard in Iola, KS . To successfully secure this opportunity, you must: • Be available to work normal hours as per company needs • Have 1+ years experience in driving a 26' box truck and/or Rear loader trash truck -CDL--Have 2 years in last 3 recent experience on the road • Have a clean MVR • Be reliable, punctual and self-motivated, with a positive attitude and strong work ethic • Willing to load tires if needed MUST BE ABLE TO PASS A BACKGROUND AND A PRE-EMPLOYMENT DRUG SCREENING. To apply visit our website at: Unitedtirerecycling.com Call 800-701-0690 18-22$ an Hr starting Pay for local and .60$ a mile for OTR starting pay.
